Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>I thought maybe I'd try a sneak attack
<clr:0000>from behind<clr:ffff>. You know, <clr:0000>stay out of their
field of view<clr:ffff>? It did not go well...
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>If someone could at least get that <clr:0000>big one<clr:ffff>
to leave...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>We'll keep wishing, but for now, you really
should steer clear of the forest.
Talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Scare_00>What if the smonster...mosstern...
MONSTER decides to raid us? I can't
sleep! I can barely talk!
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>Mr. Customer! When it's raining, get to
shelter! A little rain is probably OK, but it
would be bad if you got hit by lightning.
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Good evening, Mr. uh... Mr. Customer, sir!


Word to the wise—while the sun is down,
don't even think about wandering into the
forest near here.
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I worked so hard to build a <clr:0000>well<clr:ffff>, and now
I can't even use it!
Talk1024:
They say it's hard for monsters to pick up
your scent in the rain. But I say danger is
danger in any weather.
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>I knew it!


I thought I saw you among the trees,
putting in the work and getting rid of
that nasty monster!
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Amaaazing! Thank you!<sp:0:4:0>I was SO SCARED!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm just a kid, so I don't have any money
or anything.

But I have to reward you for getting rid of
that monster, so...
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>It was you, wasn't it, Mr. Customer? You
got rid of that nasty monster...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>I want to give you <clr:0000>Pony Points<clr:ffff> as a
thank-you for chasing off the monster, but
only <clr:0000>stable members<clr:ffff> get <clr:0000>Pony Points<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>If you save up <clr:0000>Pony Points<clr:ffff>, you can earn
all sorts of prizes.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>So please join at the counter, and talk to
me again.
Talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>Now I can thank you the way you deserve
to be thanked—with <clr:0000>two Pony Points<clr:ffff>!
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Well, good morning, Mr. uh...
Mr. Customer, sir!

Word to the wise—even though it's
daytime, I'd stay away from the forest
near here if I were you.
Talk1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>I worked so hard to build a <clr:0000>well<clr:ffff>, and now
I can't even use it!
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>You became a stable member!
That's great!
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Good afternoon, Mr. uh... Mr. Customer!


Word to the wise—don't take too much
comfort from the afternoon sun. The
forest near here is still a dangerous place.
Talk1028:
<snd:Sad_01>I mean, it's not THAT hard to make a
new well, but what if the monster attacks
our stable?
I can't sleep peacefully, knowing it's
out there.
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Thanks to you, that nasty monster is
gone, and I can welcome customers
with peace of mind! Thank you!
Talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I thought maybe I'd try a sneak attack
<clr:0000>from behind<clr:ffff>. You know, <clr:0000>stay out of the
monsters' field of view<clr:ffff>?
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>It did not go well...<sp:0:4:0>And my brother's no help. Total slacker.
Completely unreliable.<sp:0:4:0>If someone could at least get that <clr:0000>big one<clr:ffff>
to leave...
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>Now I can welcome our customers with
peace of mind! Thank you so much!
Talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Wha... It's gone?<sp:5:1:0> M...Mr. Customer, did
you chase it off?

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Amaaazing! I was wondering why
I hadn't seen that big, nasty monster
around lately!
I can't believe you got rid of it!<sp:5:0:0> I was
so scared!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>I'm a kid, so I don't have any money or
anything, but...<sp:5:0:0>

I could give you some <clr:0000>Pony Points<clr:ffff> as a
thank-you...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>Oh! You're not a <clr:0000>stable member<clr:ffff> yet?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>If you save up <clr:0000>Pony Points<clr:ffff>, you can earn
all sorts of prizes.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>So talk to me again once you've joined
the club, OK?
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>We've got a monster problem. A scary one
moved in and made a forest... I mean
forestress... I mean fortress!
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Anyway, it is B-A-D BAD news! And it
brought some other monsters with it!

And look!
Talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Wha... It's gone?<sp:5:1:0> M...Mr. Customer,
did you chase it off?<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>That's amazing!<sp:0:4:0>I was wondering why I couldn't see that
big, nasty monster just now! I can't
believe you got rid of it! I was so scared!
I'm a kid, so I don't have any money or
anything, but...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Mr. Customer...<sp:5:0:0>you're a member, right?
Talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I knew it! I was cheering for you from here
the whole time!

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Amaaazing! Thank you!


I was SO SCARED!


I'm just a kid, so I don't have any money
or anything.

But I could give you <clr:0000>Pony Points<clr:ffff> as a
thank-you...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>Oh, you're not a <clr:0000>stable member<clr:ffff> yet,
are you?

<sp:3:0:2:0801>If you save up <clr:0000>Pony Points<clr:ffff>, you can turn
them in for all sorts of prizes, so come
talk to me again once you've joined!
